articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: This blog is a portfolio about my studies in R, mainly on data science.
articles.contents:
Hi!
 
  My name is Gabriel de Freitas Pereira and I am a Forest Engineering student from UFSCar (Federal University of São Carlos) and I started to study it at 2018. Since there I have been dedicating my studies on conservation and at 2019 I started to write a project to find out the priority areas for conservation of Brazil nut trees with climate and genetics analyses. At 2020 the project was approved and I started to study R language, which is quite cool and it brought to me the area that I was looking for which is: environmental data science.
  So the main goal for this blog is to keep myself studying it and posting things about data science regarding my forest studies.
